job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtData ScientistltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtThis position will be joining a team thats primary focus will be Government ContractsltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAs a  Data Scientist will support enabling and growth for the existing automation efforts and drive forward their natural language processing effortsampnbspThis is a crossfunctional team that is adding talent at all levels As an early member of the team your experience is going to be valuable in making datadriven decisionsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtLocation ltstronggtNorthampnbspAustin office if youd like to use itltpgtltpgtltstronggtSalaryltstronggt 120k  135kltpgtltpgtltstronggtVisa Statusltstronggt US CitizenltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtAnalyze raw data assessing quality cleansing structuring for downstream processingltligtltligtDesign accurate and scalable prediction algorithmsltligtltligtCollaborate with the engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to productionltligtltligtGenerate actionable insights for business improvementsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtMS in a quantitative field Statistics Mathematics Computer Science Engineering etcltligtltligtAt least 1  2 years of experience as a Data ScientistltligtltligtDeep understanding of predictive modeling machinelearning clustering and classification techniques and algorithmsltligtltligtFluency in PythonltligtltligtWorked with terabytes of dataltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtFor further details please submit a resumeltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAustin Fraser Inc is acting as an employment business in relation to this advert As a professional company we gladly welcome applications from persons of any age and background and do not intend to discriminate with advert text and terminologyltpgt
